message: I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 60/40 split is more reflective of the situation.  What do you say?
Okay, Alice, how about a compromise? 55/45.  The clock is ticking!
Alice, we need to agree soon!  I'm offering a 52.5/47.5 split -  This is a fair deal considering the time pressure.  Take it or leave it!
